data.text:
We are hiring! If you are passionate about shaping the next generation of Malaysian leaders, join our team in providing higher education access through our programme that covers scholarships and employability for the youths of Malaysia! Positions available: üëâüèº Finance Manager üëâüèº Finance Intern üëâüèº Programme Executive For the full the full job descriptions, visit https://lnkd.in/gJe8qWVF (link in bio). Spread the word and tag potential candidates! #yayasantar #tarfoundation #ytar

We are hiring! If you are passionate about shaping the next generation of Malaysian leaders, join our team in providing higher education access through our programmes that covers scholarships and employability for the youths of Malaysia! Positions available: üëâüèº Programme Executive üëâüèº FutureReady Intern For the full job descriptions, visit https://lnkd.in/gJe8qWVF. Spread the word and share with potential candidates!

Yayasan Tunku Abdul Rahman is reopening applications for the Gemilang programme! We are collaborating with Google to reduce barriers to employability for underserved youth through a career advancing programme that focuses on upskilling through an independent learning experience. Quick reminder that this programme is not an academic scholarship for undergraduate studies but rather an opportunity for youths to upskill in various ways! Apply for this programme to access 7 industry recognised certifications designed to shape you into a career-ready powerhouse in 3-6 months! Apply now via the link in our bio. #GrowWithGoogle #GemilangbyGoogle #YTARxGemilang

Are you looking for an opportunity to learn about how we run programmes? We are opening applications for a FutureReady programme intern to join us at YTAR! If you're interested to apply or know someone who might be a great fit, find out more via linktr.ee/yayasantar. #yayasantar

From working as a waiter at a Mamak restaurant to leading Workers Unmuted, an advocacy platform for labour rights. As the first in his family to pursue higher education, our Tunku Scholar, Shahrizal Mizani, isn't just shaping a better future for himself and his community; but is dedicated to fostering a Malaysia founded on justice and equality for all. Read the full article by Malaysiakini at https://t.co/MNYJbbSgVS #YayasanTAR #TunkuScholar

As we come to the end of applications for the 2024 Tunku Abdul Rahman Scholarship, let's highlight the past Leadership Conference that took place a month ago where we gathered the 2022 and 2023 Tunku Scholars. Tunku Scholars are also equipped with the necessary skills and grant funding to lead their own community projects. To support their personal and professional growth throughout the programme, Scholars will also have access to mentorship. Our Tunku Scholars also had the opportunity to meet up with various partners and stakeholders that work together within the YTAR community to make the Tunku Abdul Rahman Scholarship what it is today. With that, we would like to express our deepest appreciation to AHAM Asset Management Berhad Heriot-Watt University Yayasan Universiti Teknologi PETRONAS (YUTP) University of Nottingham Malaysia Rohingya Women Development Network EY Cilisos Media as well as our Trustees, Alumni, and supporters who joined us in our mission to empower students from all over Malaysia.
